import styled from "styled-components";
export const SpinnerOverlay = styled.div`
height: 60vh;
width: 100%;
display: flex;
justify-content: center;
align-items: center;
`;
export const SpinnerContainer = styled.div`
@keyframes spinner
from
  transform: rotate(0deg)
to
  transform: rotate(360deg)

.spinner
position: fixed
width: 34px
height: 34px
top: 50%
left: 50%
margin-left: -17px
margin-top: -17px

&:after, &:before
  content: ''
  position: fixed
  border: 2px solid black
  width: 30px
  height: 30px

&:after
  animation: spinner 1800ms linear infinite

&:before
  width: 30px
  height: 30px
  margin-left: -40px
  margin-top: -1.5px
  animation: spinner 1800ms linear infinite
  animation-direction: reverse


`;

sourcesContent:
import styled from "styled-components";

export const SpinnerOverlay = styled.div`
height: 60vh;
width: 100%;
display: flex;
justify-content: center;
align-items: center;
`;

export const SpinnerContainer = styled.div`
@keyframes spinner
from
  transform: rotate(0deg)
to
  transform: rotate(360deg)

.spinner
position: fixed
width: 34px
height: 34px
top: 50%
left: 50%
margin-left: -17px
margin-top: -17px

&:after, &:before
  content: ''
  position: fixed
  border: 2px solid black
  width: 30px
  height: 30px

&:after
  animation: spinner 1800ms linear infinite

&:before
  width: 30px
  height: 30px
  margin-left: -40px
  margin-top: -1.5px
  animation: spinner 1800ms linear infinite
  animation-direction: reverse


`;
